title: The Impact of Standard Essential Patents (SEPs)
description:
As standard essential patents (SEPs) continue to accelerate and impact new industries beyond just telecommunications, it’s become increasingly challenging for stakeholders to wade through data sets, navigate data weaknesses and assess what’s truly essential in order to make the best commercial and licensing decisions.

Download this free whitepaper now!

To help you navigate the complexities of SEPs, we’ve released a new standards essential patents paper covering:

  • Challenges stemming from the significant growth in SEPs
  • Recent policy updates and long term needs to address systemic issues
  • What trends to expect in the SEP space going forward
  • Takeaways for SEP owners and implementers to tackle issues efficiently and effectively in the short term
dc:creator: Clarivate
